DOC.detailed_description: The study design randomize , parallel group clinical trial one control two test group . The efficacy modality evaluate compare oral malodor indicator use 15 minute ( mask effect ) 7 day ( therapeutic effect ) use . Three indicator oral malodor record ; Organoleptic score ( OLS ) , Self-assessment oral malodor , level volatile sulfur compound ( VSC ) measure breath checker device . Ethical committee approval obtain research center Riyadh Colleges Dentistry Pharmacy ( FUGRP/2013/114 ) prior conduct study . Between March December 2014 , screen volunteer 212 female dental student age 18-35 year carry . Preliminary interview clinical examination do volunteer select sample accord study inclusion exclusion criterion . To include study , participant report suffer bad oral malodor also organoleptic score 2 . Total 167 interviewed subject exclude study fulfil eligibility criterion final sample size 45 volunteer satisfy criterion select study . The objective study fully explain inform write consent obtain participate study . One week baseline reading 45 participant receive instruction avoid eat spicy food , garlic onion 2 day prior assessment . All participant instruct maintain current oral hygiene regime . The included participant ( N=45 ) randomly divide 3 group . ( Group ME ) : 15 participant ask rinse 50 % Miswak extract mouth wash ( 5ml ) twice day 7 day . Each participant give determined volume mouth wash mark scoop prescribe dose . Compliance participant check measure remain volume bottle second visit . ( Group MS ) : 15 participant taught instruct use Miswak stick twice day 7 day . Length Miswak stick measure second visit ass compliance participant use . ( Group CH ) : 15 participant taught instruct rinse 5 ml 0.2 % Chlorohexidine gluconate mouth wash ( Oraxine ® ) twice day 7 day . Each participant give determined volume mouth wash mark scoop prescribe dose . Compliance participant check measure remain volume bottle second visit . To prepare Miswak extract , group fresh Miswak stick collect local market chop small piece . The stick allow dry room temperature 2 day ground powder . To prepare mouth wash , 10 gm powder add 100 ml sterile distil water allow soak another two day temperature 4°C . It centrifuge 15 minute 2000 rpm filter use 0.45 μm pore size paper . The resultant solution dilute distilled water ratio 1:1 use within one week . Measurements oral malodor indicator : All reading take early morning one three hour breakfast tooth brushing . Measurements include follow : - Self-assessment mouth odor - Organoleptic score ( OLS ) - Volatile sulfur compound Data analysis perform use pair t-test compare different indicator score use method . One way ANOVA also perform test significance difference three method reduce oral malodor . A P < 0.05 accept level significance .
